column5: A few weekends ago my buddy filmed a commercial for Scotty fishing products and got to see it for the first time a few days ago !!! We filmed it up in Haliburton as well I got to product test the item !!! It was awesome and thought I would share it  it's myself & my boat in the commercial  hope you enjoy it ? If the mods allow  it !!! Thanks   Fish-on !!!http://m.youtube.com/watch?v=dPE-eB07JkM&list=PL96266F49E4594A39&feature=youtu.be it's for the Scotty orca rod holder
I know someone that could use one of those on his toon.   I like the crab puller Shawn.That was cool.
Very cool Shawn, nice hook set!
Thanks guys !!! And yes brian that would be awesome on a toon for sure or a yak !!!! )
How cool is that? VERY. Nice one Shawn.
Very cool Shawn.  I'm a fan of the Scotty line of products.
I bought a pair of those this year and they are great rod holders. I got ti red of not being able to get the rod out of the holder when a big fish hits. I no longer have that issue.
Thats awesome..I love the product too!
Cool Shawn, did you have a fish on or a snag?
